title: Calculate Danaos Corporation (NYSE:DAC) EV/EBITDA for fiscal year 2024 using their 2024 20F filing. Use $1.52B as Danaos's market cap on December 31st, 2024. Ignore lease liabilities and round to the nearest three decimals.
description:
1. Find FY 2024 EBITDA from Danaos's Form 20F. Record EBITDA as $697.550 million from the filing. 
 2. Find the 2024 EV components from the 20F filing. Cash and cash equivalents=$453.384 million, Total debt outstanding (gross of deferred finance costs and including current portion) as of FY2024=$744.546 million, Marketable securities =$60.850 million, 
 3. Find EV using provided market cap = 1520+744.546-453.384-60.850=$1750.312 million
 4. Find EV/EBITDA using 2024 reported EBITDA = $1750.312 million / $697.550 = 2.510 (rounded to 3 decimals)

rubric.criteria: Report Cash and cash equivalents as $453.384 million
Report total debt outstanding as $744.546 million
